query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Luogo è in inferno detto Malebolge, 2 tutto di pietra di color ferrigno, 3 come la cerchia che dintorno il volge.
query.error: **English:** 1 There is a place in Hell called Malebolge, 2 all of stone of a ferrous color, 3 like the circle that surrounds it.
query.result: 1 Narake 'sti sthānaṃ Malebolge nāma, 2 samastaṃ śilāmayaṃ lauhavarṇaṃ, 3 yathā paridhiḥ yaḥ tasya paritaḥ vartate.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 Nel dritto mezzo del campo maligno 5 vaneggia un pozzo assai largo e profondo, 6 di cui suo loco dicerò l’ordigno.
query.error: **English:** 4 In the direct middle of the evil field 5 there raves a well, very wide and deep, 6 of which I will tell the structure in its place.
query.result: 4 Ṛjumadhye kṣetrasya pāpiṣṭhasya 5 Vikṣipati kūpaḥ ati vistīrṇaḥ gambhīraśca, 6 Yasyasya sthāne vakṣyāmi vidhānam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Quel cinghio che rimane adunque è tondo 8 tra ’l pozzo e ’l piè de l’alta ripa dura, 9 e ha distinto in dieci valli il fondo.
query.error: **English:** 7 That belt which remains is therefore round, 8 between the well and the foot of the hard, high bank, 9 and it has divided the bottom into ten valleys.
query.result: 7 Saḥ kaṭakaḥ yaḥ śeṣaḥ asti ata eva vṛttaḥ asti, 8 kūpasya ca ūrdhvatīrasya ca pādābhyāṃ madhye, 9 ca daśasu upatyakāsu adhaḥsthale vibhaktaḥ asti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 Quale, dove per guardia de le mura 11 più e più fossi cingon li castelli, 12 la parte dove son rende figura,

query.result: 10 Yathā yatra prākāra-rakṣaṇāya 11 Adhika-adhika-parikhāḥ durgāṇi āveṣṭayanti, 12 Sa deśaḥ yatra tāḥ santi ābhāsam janayati,

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 così da imo de la roccia scogli 17 movien che ricidien li argini e ’ fossi 18 infino al pozzo che i tronca e raccogli.
query.error: **English:** 16 so from the foot of the rock crags 17 moved that cut off the banks and moats 18 down to the pit that cuts them off and gathers them.
query.result: 16 Tathā adhaḥ-śailāt śilāḥ 17 Calantiḥ āsannaḥ parikhāḥ khaṇḍayanti sma 18 Yāvat tat-kuṇḍam yena tāḥ khaṇḍayanti ca saṃgṛhṇāti ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 In questo luogo, de la schiena scossi 20 di Gerïon, trovammoci; e ’l poeta 21 tenne a sinistra, e io dietro mi mossi.
query.error: **English:** 19 In this place, from the back we slid down 20 of Geryon, we found ourselves; and the poet 21 kept to the left, and I moved behind him.
query.result: 19 Asmin sthāne, Geriyoṇaḥ pṛṣṭhāt praśritau 20 Āvāṃ babhūvāva; kaviś ca 21 Vāme sthitaḥ, aham ca tasya paścāt pracalitaḥ.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 A la man destra vidi nova pieta, 23 novo tormento e novi frustatori, 24 di che la prima bolgia era repleta.
query.error: **English:** 22 On the right hand I saw a new pain, 23 a new torment and new scourgers, 24 with which the first ditch was replete.
query.result: 22 Dakṣiṇe haste apaśyam navīm karuṇām, 23 navam piḍām navānśca praharaṇakārān, 24 yebhyaḥ prathamā parikhā pūrṇā āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 25 Adhaḥ pāpināḥ nagnāḥ āsīt, 26 madhyāt ūrdhvaṃ ca asmābhiḥ saha āgacchanti sma, 27 asmābhiḥ saha, api tu atiriktābhiḥ gatībhiḥ,

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 che da l’un lato tutti hanno la fronte 32 verso ’l castello e vanno a Santo Pietro, 33 da l’altra sponda vanno verso ’l monte.
query.error: **English:** 31 so that on one side they all have their faces 32 toward the castle and go to Saint Peter's, 33 on the other side they go toward the mountain.
query.result: 31 yathā eka-pārśve sarveṣām mukham 32 durga-abhimukham asti, ca santi-pitṛ-gṛham prati gacchanti, 33 anya-tīre parvata-abhimukham gacchanti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 Di qua, di là, su per lo sasso tetro 35 vidi demon cornuti con gran ferze, 36 che li battien crudelmente di retro.
query.error: **English:** 34 On this side, on that, over the rough stone, 35 I saw horned demons with great scourges, 36 who were cruelly beating them from behind.
query.result: 34 Iha, amutra, upari śilātīkṣṇāyām, 35 Apaśyam asuraan śṛṅginah mahābhiḥ śūlaiḥ, 36 Ye tāḍayanti sma nṛśaṃsteṣāṃ paścāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 37 Aha katham kurvanti sma tāḥ pravahaṇāni 38 ādyābhiḥ prahāraiḥ! Na kaścit 39 dvitīyāḥ tṛtīyā vā apīkṣate sma.

query.prompt:

query.result: 103 Tataḥ śuśruma janaṃ yaḥ sannihitam āsa 104 anyatra bolge yaśca svakīyam vaktram abhighātayati sma, 105 ātmānam ca svakīyaiḥ pāṇibhiḥ praharati sma.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
